Label: Foundations
Description: These kits help you establish good foundations in an AWS Account. They include basic security and compliance tools, cost controls and network setup kits.

Label: Basic Components
Description: These kits allow you to create core infrastructure components, such as EC2 instances and RDS databases.

Label: Common Patterns
Description: These kits solve for common patterns using multiple AWS services.

Label: Advanced Solutions
Description: These advanced solutions cover more complex applications and services, including solutions from third party vendors.
